product_name: Brooks Spartan II Pants - Women's Petite - 2012 Closeout
long_description: A feminine spin on classic track pants, the Brooks Spartan II pants in women's petite sizing offer a stretchy performance fabric that looks great and feels even better during long training runs. Quick-drying, stretchy fabric wicks sweat away so you stay comfortable. Elastic waist adjusts with drawcord to personalize the fit. 2 side zip pockets hold keys, cash and ID. Bottom leg zips allow easy on/off over running shoes. The women's petite Brooks Spartan II pants sport a reflective logo and leg zippers that boost your visibility to traffic. Relaxed fit; mid rise. Closeout.
short_description: A feminine spin on classic track pants, the Brooks Spartan II pants in women's petite sizing offer a stretchy performance fabric that looks great and feels even better during long training runs.
